name: Saving What
tagline: see all form items to be submitted on Update/Publish, with indicator of value change, Heartbeat integration for indication of new fields, and sortable columns
body:
### What's it do?
Shows all form input element IDs, names, types, and values, with sortable columns. Row color changes (red) if value of input has changed, and with WordPress Heartbeat integration, new input fields are added to the list and indicated (green).

![](https://github.com/crstauf/Saving-What/raw/master/screenshot.png)

### provided as-is for anyone to use. be free to fork and customize as suits you, just give mention me (give credit).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
